module.name: Google Voice
module.description: Manage Google Voice accounts as trunks.
module.changelog: *0.1.0* make the module work for FreePBX 2.9 *0.0.9* changed trunk name to the phonenum *0.0.8* fixed routing/reload, delete routes, and overwriting trunks(?) *0.0.7* added donation blurb *0.0.6* improved outbound route *0.0.5* fixed path on delGV action, and corrected trunk dial string *0.0.4* added GPL declarations. *0.0.3* trunk and route options added. *0.0.2* TOS and jabber (jingle?) reload added. *0.0.1* Creation.
